mapper.insert: insert into IM_MODEL_MAPPING (PK_ID, MODEL_ID, SEQ, NAME, COL_ID, NOTE,TYPE,LENGTH,DESCRIBE,INDEXED,PRIMARY,STORED) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{length,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indexed},#{primary},#{stored})
mapper.update: update IM_MODEL_MAPPING set MODEL_ID = #{modelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COL_ID = #{colId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, MODEL_ID, SEQ, NAME, COL_ID, NOTE,TYPE,LENGTH,DESCRIBE,INDEXED,PRIMARY,STORED from IM_MODEL_MAPPING

select IMM.PK_ID, IMM.MODEL_ID, IMM.SEQ, IMM.NAME, IMM.COL_ID, IMM.NOTE,IMM.TYPE,IMM.LENGTH,IMM.DESCRIBE, IMM.INDEXED,IMM.PRIMARY,IMM.STORED from IM_MODEL_MAPPING IMM where IMM.MODEL_ID = #{mid} ORDER BY IMM.SEQ asc

SELECT IMM.PK_ID, IMM.MODEL_ID, IMM.SEQ, IMM.NAME, IMC.NAME COL_ID, IMM.NOTE,IMM.TYPE,IMM.LENGTH,IMM.DESCRIBE, IMM.INDEXED,IMM.PRIMARY,IMM.STORED FROM IM_MODEL_MAPPING IMM LEFT JOIN IM_METADATA_COLUMN IMC ON IMC.PK_ID = IMM.COL_ID WHERE MODEL_ID = #{mId} ORDER BY IMM.SEQ asc
